disclaimerPage.subHeader: Blitz doesn't have access to any of your funds, if funds are lost we can not help you recover them.
disclaimerPage.imgCaption: 'With great power comes great responsibility' - Uncle Ben

securityOptionPage.header: First, Let's create your recovery phrase
securityOptionPage.subHeader: A recovery phrase is a series of 12 words in a specific order. This word combination is unique to your wallet. Make sure to have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down.

generateKeyPage.header: This is your password to your money, if you lose it you lose your money!
generateKeyPage.subHeader: Write it down with pen and paper and keep it safe!
generateKeyPage.disclaimer: WE CAN NOT HELP YOU IF YOU LOSE IT

skipMessage.header: We recommend that you write down your seed phrase
skipMessage.subHeader: If you do not have your seed phrase written down you risk losing your money.

home.error1: Please enter all of your keys.
home.error2: This is not a valid mnemonic.
home.error3: Your words are not the same as the generated words

loadingScreen.loadingText: We're setting things up. Hang tight! This could take up to a minute.
loadingScreen.errorText1: Error connecting to your node. Try reloading the app.
